actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Environmental Pesticide Control Act of 1972.

summary.text: Provides, under the Federal Environmental Pesticide Control Act, that the certification standard for a private applicator of pesticides shall be deemed fulfilled by his signing a self- certification form. States that the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency shall assure that such form contains adequate information and affirmations regarding the skill of such applicator.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Environmental Pesticide Control Act of 1972.
